name: Kids Go Down
description:
Kids Go Down

------------------------------Go as deep as you can------------------------------

Description

This is the first game I made. It referenced a classic game called "NS-SHAFT" made by 草薙 昭彦.

Rules
  • Total HP = 9
  • Game over when HP = 0 / fall out of the bottom screen.
  • touch each floor +1HP
  • touch the top spikes -4HP
  • an acceleration tool appeared for after three floors
  • No maximum level, stay as long as you can, feel free to post your maximum level you get. (mine is 27 level.)
Control
  • AD / ←→: horizontal move
  • spacebar: accelerate for 2 seconds when green cylinder is got
Soundtrack Links
